long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitter Video Downloader - Download Twitter Videos and GIFs from tweets

Easily download Twitter videos and GIFs in high-quality MP4 format directly from your browser. With our extension, you can save your favorite content quickly and efficiently, free of watermarks. Perfect for anyone who needs a reliable Twitter downloader.

Features:

1. A download button appears under every Tweet with a video or GIF.
2. No watermarks â€“ enjoy clean downloads every time.
3. Supports both the old Twitter platform and X.com.

How to Use the Twitter Video Downloader:

1. Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. You will see a download icon (down arrow) under every tweet containing a video or an image or a GIF.
3. Simply click the download icon that appears below the Tweet.

If you have any issues, questions or suggestions please contact us.
